title: *1 Month FREE* Scenic Tranquility @ this Beautiful West ATX Community
posting_body: * After you self prorate the 1 month free special this apartment will be $1230/ month *
The perfect Hill Country hideaway, this property provides scenic tranquility in its beautiful location near the Balcones Canyondland Preserve, Lake Austin and Lake Travis.

Situated near the intersection of Highway 620 and 2222, our community is convenient to both north Austin employers and downtown shopping, dining and entertainment while still offering the peace and tranquility you desire.
Your next home will feature a spacious interior with nine foot ceilings, a private balconies, and fully applianced gourmet kitchens with granite countertops and custom wood cabinetry.
Enjoy lush landscaping and expansive natural areas in addition to their resort style swimming pool with sun deck, Alfresco grilling area, fitness center with cardio and strength training equipment.

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
